long_description: The DAKINE Heli-Pro 20L snow pack comfortably carries your load, whether you're chasing powder on the front of the mountain, riding backside bowls or just hauling gear around the village. Snug-fitting design hugs the load close to your body for better balance on uneven terrain and low-profile ease on chairlifts; compression straps further streamline the pack. Carry your snowboard in a stable and secure vertical configuration, or strap on alpine or backcountry skis diagonally; side holster secures your shovel handle or ice axe. Anatomically shaped shoulder straps and padded hipbelt help ensure all-day carrying comfort; sternum strap buckle doubles as a rescue whistle. Internal sleeve with tube exit port carries a water reservoir (sold separately) for easy hydration on the go. Non-padded laptop sleeve (fits most 15 in. laptops). Includes a zippered organizer pocket and fleece-lined goggles pocket. The DAKINE Heli-Pro 20L snow pack is made of 600-denier polyester fabric for light weight, durability and water resistance.
short_description: The DAKINE Heli-Pro 20L snow pack comfortably carries your load, whether you're chasing powder on the front of the mountain, riding backside bowls or just hauling gear around the village.
